title: FUCK YOU RIOT AND YOUR MATCHING SYSTEM
body: Now more and more players play this game and you guys make money ah? So you guys don't care this game anymore. You don't care about feeding, don't care about reports. You guys even have no idea what is "negative attitude". You just give some little punishment only to the player are really afk, which is 5 mins not move or disconnected. Others you don't give a shit about it. And how about your match system? How the fuck i can get the teammates with no brain at all. Your company sucks now, and your game will suck, especially NA server. Bunch of stupid useless teammates and even more stupid and more useless employees.
